name: Bean World (Danyle)
description:
This is one of my first Game Projects Developed using the Pygame Engine, so expect some Jank..

Bean World is a short Pixel-Based RPG where you play as a Can of Beans roaming around Bean World. Interact with other Beans to hear some QUIRKY Bean puns, walk around the color shifted alternate rooms and.. That's really it.

Have fun with it.
